entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 12.
